content.raw:
Looks good to me.  I tried this with wind in the environment and it worked as expected: vehicle was stationary in 2D plane until transitioned to “ready” state and then started drifting due to the wind force.  This should be a very useful base class.

I’m good with PR#60 as well - just had the one comment about red/green vs. right/left.  Otherwise good to merge both of these.
content.html:
Looks good to me. I tried this with wind in the environment and it worked as expected: vehicle was stationary in 2D plane until transitioned to “ready” state and then started drifting due to the wind force. This should be a very useful base class.

I’m good with PR#60 as well - just had the one comment about red/green vs. right/left. Otherwise good to merge both of these.
